title: Reinstalling the game
body:
Whenever I try to install League, It keeps telling me "The older version of League of legends cannot be removed" What does that even mean? Help! 
   {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Sounds like there might be a pathing, file, or security setting preventing an uninstall.  Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) might be able to help here!  Grab that and process a clean uninstall to fix this up.  Let me know if that helps.
